title: SHACO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
body:
YES!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

YES!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!


I shed a tear...I know it's pathetic but I did.

God bless UOL.

replies.body:
God bless UoL.

I hope to see them at MSI.
Udyr, TF jungle, Shaco, gg Kikis you are god.

> [{quoted}](name=MCBiggah99,realm=EUW,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=0cEE0Mbr,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-04-05T18:18:14.041+0000)
>
> Udyr, TF jungle, Shaco, gg Kikis you are god.

I'm so excited omfg I hope UOL wins.
LINK ME IMMEDIATELY. PLS.

> [{quoted}](name=ScreamPaste,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=0cEE0Mbr,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-04-05T19:03:36.959+0000)
>
> LINK ME IMMEDIATELY. PLS.

https://youtu.be/VqGruEZ7cr8?t=5m20s
It was live just now. It will be uploaded tomorrow to lolesports youtube.
I... I missed Shaco being played? ;-;

The video should be up on the esports page now.  UoL vs GMB, game 4.
(They also pulled out Udyr for game 2 & 3)

Go enjoy.  Like most UoL games it's *amazing*.
UoL is now my FAVOURITE team.

Welcome to the party.

Might I also suggest [UoL vs Fnatic](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NBQ1KdfXoxY) from earlier in this LCS?  It's probably the most exciting and crazy LCS game this season.
Yes, I loved that game, and made all of my friends who play watch it. Unicorns are love, unicorns are life.

> [{quoted}](name=Garlyle Wilds,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=0cEE0Mbr,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2015-04-05T22:10:20.704+0000)
> 
> Go enjoy.  Like most UoL games it's *amazing*.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/esports/dw8r1g7q-help-me-make-uolesports-a-thing
You poor thing...
incoming shaco nerfs ;-;

Dw he gets a rework this summer :)

EDIT- now he isn't
Huh? It's confirmed for this summer aren't they still working on poppy eve taric and ww first?

Poopy is first in line for rework, then Urgod should be shortly after (according to meddler) Shaco is not a Sion level rework project but he's in line for it

(There is a debate whether he is getting it or not, I've seen rioters say he is and others saying he isn't so it might not even happen at all)

Shaco is confirmed to not be getting a rework. At all. Darius too.

Riot said this themselves. They think he is fine, and that they will buff both of them if needed.

Darius might be getting changes to his bleed, but Shaco has nothing planned atm.
Weird, 3 weeks ago meddler said he was getting rework by august

*"The Shaco rework we talked about a little a while back got shelved. It had some interesting ideas in it, but after testing we weren't confident it was the right solution in terms of fixing problems while maintaining Shaco's identity. Possible we'll give it another shot at some point, no immediate plans to though."*
Oh, thanks for the update!

I loved how in the first game they got stomped by gambit, and how gambit was all like "I think we're the better team, blah blah blah." Then they proceeded to get stomped by off-meta picks, and just straight up threw fights etc. UOL is overall just a better team.
don't know why, but if I got the feeling we will see a poppy against SK
Don't forget the bear slap
I wonder what UOL skins would look like

The score is what you would expect on a great shaco run vs pros 2/0/6
THis match shows the strengths and weakensses of Shaco well.
YESSSSS

> [{quoted}](name=Bangkorai,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=0cEE0Mbr,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-04-05T18:17:11.865+0000)
>
> God bless UOL.

Amen.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/esports/dw8r1g7q-help-me-make-uolesports-a-thing

This UoL is making quite the fuss lately.
Are they actually worth watching, or is this just hype for off-meta picks?

> [{quoted}](name=Ariel the Cruel,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=0cEE0Mbr,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2015-04-06T15:23:41.439+0000)
>
> This UoL is making quite the fuss lately.
> Are they actually worth watching, or is this just hype for off-meta picks?

They are very skilled and the organization hasn't  gotten to the point where playing an off-meta pick means they will lose their job if they drop a match.  They fight a lot, they force enemy team to fight a lot (or roll over and die), and they do it in ways that make it so they can win.

The off-meta picks aren't random or ill-considered.  They picked Udyr into an enemy team comp that had low damage and couldn't kite away from him.  They picked Shaco and ran him like he was a Zed, just coming from the jungle lane.

The only concern I have is that they took a while to adapt to 5.5, because they have 4 people who want to play carries; 5 if you consider that Hylissang was a mid player who mained Orianna before he joined them.  When they build all comfort picks they don't have any tanks.

They will break your heart sometimes (9-9 during the split) but when they are on they are amazing.

What i want to know is if kikis was going to sell his skirmishers sabre in place of a better 6th item.

I want to know what he was going to build after tri force, would it have been ie? gb? lw? I wana know!
GG Gambit...

i hate to be that guy, but do you guyz know that :

1. SKT in LCK have pulled the udyr (and got it banned against them the following game) some weeks ago ?
2. InSec had played shaco competitively in LPL last season a few times, so its not like its the first time we see a shaco ever...?
3. It's been months since that one TF jungle game, and it's kinda unlikely that he will do that again ?
4. they have played what you would call "meta" champions for most of the season? 

They are a good team, and its great that they look beyond what everyone plays to find good champions (a lot of them are overlooked until people like them find them **AND** play them when the teams compositions is appropriate to bring it out), but i cant help, but feel people only like them because of a few unusual pick and their team name, instead of their actual players and their plays.
